mapper.select: select *,c.cc_name from borrow_contract a left join mode_status m on m.mode_id=a.b_id left join consociation_company c on c.cc_id=a.unit_yi where m.status=#{status}
select count(1) from (select distinct b_no from borrow_contract where b_no like #{year}) as a
mapper.update: update borrow_contract set b_no=#{bc.bNo}, unit_jia=#{bc.unitJia}, unit_yi=#{bc.unitYi}, cj_no=#{bc.cjNo}, fb_no=#{bc.fbNo}, this_borrow_money=#{bc.thisBorrowMoney}, rate=#{bc.rate}, interest_payment_method=#{bc.interestPaymentMethod}, borrow_time=#{bc.borrowTime}, borrow_end_time=#{bc.borrowEndTime}, accumulated_borrowing_money=#{bc.accumulatedBorrowingMoney}, borrowing_purposes=#{bc.borrowingPurposes} where b_id=#{bc.bId}
mapper.select: select *,c.cc_name from borrow_contract a left join consociation_company c on c.cc_id=a.unit_yi where b_no=#{no} and history=0

UPDATE borrow_contract SET history=1 WHERE b_id=#{id}
UPDATE borrow_contract SET history=0 WHERE b_id=#{id}
mapper.select: SELECT IFNULL(SUM(this_borrow_money),0) as accumulated_borrowing_money FROM borrow_contract as a LEFT JOIN mode_status as b on a.b_id=b.mode_id where fb_no=#{no} and b.status=2
SELECT this_borrow_money,rate,borrow_time,borrow_end_time FROM borrow_contract as a LEFT JOIN mode_status as b on a.b_id=b.mode_id where fb_no=#{no} and b.status=2
